name: You
description:
• Procedurally generated, infinitely large game world.
  • Dynamic difficulty. The game gets harder as you get stronger.
  • Simplistic art style. For all kinds of players!
  • Unlimited fun! The game can keep going forever!

How to play: use mouse only

Credits

  • Programming & Design: Yidi Zhu
  • Sound Design: Yutian Zheng
  • Skybox: Boxophobic from Unity Asset Store

Android version: https://goo.gl/F2mTb4

Build at the time of Frontier of Freedom submission deadline (when the difficulty curve was not fine-tuned): https://goo.gl/3tEPzg
